Module com.simulator.hospital
Package com.simulator.hospital.model.logic

Class ServiceUnit

java.lang.Object
com.simulator.hospital.model.logic.ServiceUnit
public class ServiceUnit extends Object
Models a service unit in the simulation. A service unit consists of a queue of customers, a set of service points, and functionality for managing service processes.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ServiceUnit

      public ServiceUnit(ContinuousGenerator generator, EventList eventList, EventType type, int servicePointNumber)
      Constructs a new service unit with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      generator - the generator for creating service times.
      eventList - the event list for scheduling events.
      type - the event type for service completion.
      servicePointNumber - the number of service points in this unit.

  • Method Details

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the service unit.
      Returns:
      the x-coordinate.

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the service unit.
      Returns:
      the y-coordinate.

    • setX

      public void setX(int x)
      Sets the x-coordinate of the service unit.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate to set.

    • setY

      public void setY(int y)
      Sets the y-coordinate of the service unit.
      Parameters:
      y - the y-coordinate to set.

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex()
      Gets the index of the service unit.
      Returns:
      the index.

    • addQueue

      public void addQueue(Customer customer)
      Adds a customer to the waiting queue.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to add to the queue.

    • endService

      public Customer endService()
      Completes the service for the first customer in the serving queue.
      Returns:
      the customer whose service was completed.

    • beginService

      public ServicePoint beginService()
      Begins servicing the first customer in the queue. Assigns the customer to an available service point and schedules a service completion event.
      Returns:
      the service point where the customer is being served.

    • isReserved

      public boolean isReserved()
      Checks if all service points in this unit are currently reserved.
      Returns:
      true if all service points are reserved, false otherwise.

    • isOnQueue

      public boolean isOnQueue()
      Checks if there are customers waiting in the queue.
      Returns:
      true if the queue is not empty, false otherwise.

    • getSelectedServicePoint

      public ServicePoint getSelectedServicePoint(Customer customer)
      Retrieves the service point assigned to a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer whose service point is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the service point assigned to the customer, or null if none.

    • getServicePoints

      public ArrayList<ServicePoint> getServicePoints()
      Gets the list of service points in this service unit.
      Returns:
      a list of service points.

    • resetCount

      public static void resetCount()
      Resets the static counter for service unit indices. Useful when starting a new simulation.
